Class ButtonCollection.Coordinate

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.ButtonCollection.Coordinate
Enclosing class:
ButtonCollection
public static class ButtonCollection.Coordinate extends Object
Represents the coordinates of a rendered button, relative to the first button in a ButtonCollection

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    x
    The x coordinate, from left to right
    int
    y
    The y coordinate, from up to down

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Coordinate()
    Creates a new coordinate object which points to (0, 0)
    Coordinate(ButtonCollection.Coordinate c)
    Copies the provided coordinate object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ButtonCollection.Coordinate

    Returns a new coordinate, which has it's y one more than this coordinate's y.

    • left

      public ButtonCollection.Coordinate left()
      Returns a new coordinate, which has it's y one less than this coordinate's y. Does not modify this object.
      Returns:
      the resulting coordinate object

    • right

      public ButtonCollection.Coordinate right()
      Returns a new coordinate, which has it's x one more than this coordinate's x. Does not modify this object.
      Returns:
      the resulting coordinate object

    • up

      public ButtonCollection.Coordinate up()
      Returns a new coordinate, which has it's y one less than this coordinate's y. Does not modify this object.
      Returns:
      the resulting coordinate object

    • down

      public ButtonCollection.Coordinate down()
      Returns a new coordinate, which has it's y one more than this coordinate's y. Does not modify this object.
      Returns:
      the resulting coordinate object
